response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be well above $15,000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it for a special introductory price of $20,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or would like to proceed with this exceptional offer.", "product_price": 20000}
